about_the_game:
Prepare to embark on an extraordinary journey into the fantastical world of dreams in "Rock a Bye." In this charming N64 Inspired 3D platformer, you'll assume the role of an adventurous baby as you explore the depths of your own imagination. Dive into five captivating dreamworlds, including "The Toy Kingdom" and "Junkfood Junction," where your platforming skills will be put to the test, and your sense of wonder will know no bounds.

Key Features

1. Dreamlike Exploration

Venture into five distinct dream worlds, each with its own captivating theme and set of challenges. From the vibrant and whimsical "Toy Kingdom" to the mouthwatering and perilous "Junkfood Junction," every dreamworld is a unique adventure waiting to be uncovered.

2. Jump and Dash Through Dreams:

Harness the incredible jumping and dashing abilities of your baby protagonist to navigate intricate levels filled with platforms, puzzles, and hidden surprises. Every leap is a thrill, and every dash propels you further into the realm of dreams.

3. customize Your Dream Baby

Express your unique style by collecting a delightful array of outfits and accessories to customize your baby character. Transform your dreamer into a one-of-a-kind hero, ready to conquer the imaginative challenges that await.

4. Unravel Dream Mysteries


Each dream world is shrouded in secrets and brimming with captivating stories. Immerse yourself in the narrative as you uncover the mysteries of your own dreams, piecing together a tale that is as enchanting as the dreams themselves.

5. Dream Big, Baby

"Rock a Bye" invites you to embrace the boundless power of dreams, where the ordinary becomes extraordinary and the impossible becomes reality. Prepare to be enchanted as you journey through the dreamscape of a baby's imagination in this delightful 3D platformer.

name: Rock A Bye Demo
short_description: "Rock a Bye" is a cute N64 inspired 3D platformer where you play as a baby, bouncing, dashing, and collecting outfits in 5 dreamy worlds.
